level.text: The shouting and crying of hawkers, peddlers, and vendors shall be prohibited at nighttime on any day of the week, irrespective of its compliance with ยง 2701 of Chapter 27 of this subtitle.

The limitation of ยง 2805.1 shall not be construed to prohibit selling by outcry of merchandise, food, and beverages at licensed sporting events, parades, fairs, circuses, or other similar licensed entertainment events.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 5 of the District of Columbia Noise Control Act of 1977, D.C. Law 2-53, 24 DCR 5293, 5309 (December 30, 1977).
